remarks: Lemma for ~ pnt .  Add up the pieces in ~ pntlemi to get an estimate slightly better than the naive lower bound ` 0 ` .  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 13-Apr-2016.)

pntlem1.U $e |- ( ph -> A. z e. ( Y [,) +oo ) ( abs ` ( ( R ` z ) / z ) ) <_ U ) $.
pntlem1.K $e |- ( ph -> A. y e. ( X (,) +oo ) E. z e. RR+ ( ( y < z /\ ( ( 1 + ( L x. E ) ) x. z ) < ( K x. y ) ) /\ A. u e. ( z [,] ( ( 1 + ( L x. E ) ) x. z ) ) ( abs ` ( ( R ` u ) / u ) ) <_ E ) ) $.
pntlemf $p |- ( ph -> ( ( U - E ) x. ( ( ( L x. ( E ^ 2 ) ) / ( ; 3 2 x. B ) ) x. ( ( log ` Z ) ^ 2 ) ) ) <_ sum_ n e. ( 1 ... ( |_ ` ( Z / Y ) ) ) ( ( ( U / n ) - ( abs ` ( ( R ` ( Z / n ) ) / Z ) ) ) x. ( log ` n ) ) ) $.
